column4: I'm using edgy and I just installed it on my laptop with an atheros wifi card. when I try to bring up the network I get an ath0 no such device error, but it detected it during the install. does anyone have any ideas?
no I haven't. I'm still confused as to why it would detect ath0 in the install, let me configure it, and also be active long enough to give me an update notification with 100+ upgrades, but not work
en0: ERROR while getting interface flags: No such device
